item.title: Resumé & Work History
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: For better or worse, this is my complete professional work history. I’ve long wanted to keep a single, detailed list of all the various positions I’ve held and projects I’ve participated in over my 35 year working history, here it is! 2011-2017: Technical Software Director, Energy Solutions, Oakland CA Consulting and development services Architect and principal developer of firm’s first commercial product, specifically on behalf of nationwide utility rebate incentive processing (Python).
